name: Escape The Room - Castle Escape
description:
Escape The Room - Castle Escape is a super addictive brain puzzle, where you will have to find the differences between two pictures each time you play.


Game Features:
- 25 play scenes available.
- Support for iPad devices,
- Hints and boosters which will help you to find all the evidences.
- iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus support!

Have fun escaping the castle and finding the differences.
